Uses of Action in org.mokai
 

Methods in org.mokai that return types with arguments of type Action
 List<Action> ConnectorService.getPostProcessingActions()
          Retrieves the registered post-processing actions.
 List<Action> ConnectorService.getPostReceivingActions()
          Retrieves the registered post-receiving actions.
 List<Action> ConnectorService.getPreProcessingActions()
          Retrieves the registered pre-processing actions.
 

Methods in org.mokai with parameters of type Action
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.addPostProcessingAction(Action action)
          Adds an Action to the collection of post-processing actions if it doesn't exists.
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.addPostReceivingAction(Action action)
          Adds an Action to the collection of post-receiving actions if it doesn't exists.
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.addPreProcessingAction(Action action)
          Adds an Action to the collection of pre-processing actions if it doesn't exists.
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.removePostProcessingAction(Action action)
          Removes an Action from the collection of post-processing actions if it exists.
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.removePostReceivingAction(Action action)
          Removes an Action from the collection of post-receiving actions if it exists.
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.removePreProcessingAction(Action action)
          Removes an Action from the collection of pre-processing actions if it exists.
 

Uses of Action in org.mokai.action
 

Classes in org.mokai.action that implement Action
 class AddPrefixAction
          An action that adds a prefix to a string if the string doesn't starts with the prefix.
 class AddSpacesAction
          An action that fills a string with spaces until the string is of the specified length.
 class AddSuffixAction
          An action that adds a suffix to a string if the string doesn't ends with the suffix.
 class ConcatAction
          An action that concats multiple fields in a new field.
 class CopyAction
          Copies the value of a property into another property
 class RemoveAction
          An action that removes a field from a message (if it exists).
 class ReplaceAction
          An action that replaces strings on a field.
 class UpdateAction
          An action that adds or updates a field in a message.
